title: Alice (band)
text:
Alice (Japanese: アリス) is a Japanese three-man folk rock band formed in 1971 by Shinji Tanimura (1948–2023), Takao Horiuchi, and Toru Yazawa.
Among their biggest hits were "Fuyu no Inazuma" ("Winter Lightning", 1977), "Johnny’s Lullaby", and "Champion".
